project.name: BaseVault
project.description: Production-ready DeFi vault dashboard on Base chain

theme_strategy.visual_style: Deep Void backgrounds, Neon Data accents, Glassmorphism overlays

card.style: bg-card border border-border rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

button.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2.5 transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,82,255,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(0,82,255,0.5)]
button.secondary: bg-secondary/20 text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/30 border border-secondary/20 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2.5
button.outline: border border-border bg-transparent hover:bg-accent hover:text-white rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5

input.base: bg-background border border-border rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 focus:border-primary transition-all placeholder:text-muted-foreground

badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

images.pattern_overlay: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 20 20' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cg fill='%239C92AC' fill-opacity='0.05' fill-rule='evenodd'%3E%3Ccircle cx='3' cy='3' r='1'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='13' cy='13' r='1'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/svg%3E

icons.custom: HeroIcons for UI, CryptoIcons (generic) for tokens if needed

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for main backgrounds; use them for accents or overlays.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data (APY, TVL, Balance) and addresses.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that brightens or lifts.
Use 2-3x more padding than standard Tailwind defaults.
instructions_to_main_agent: Configure Tailwind to use the specified colors in 'design_guidelines.json'.
Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Navbar (with ConnectButton) and Footer.
Mock data for Vaults initially, but structure the service layer to fetch from API.
Implement the 'Network Switch' in the Navbar next to the Connect Button.
The '/vaults' page should be the main dashboard view.
The '/vaults/:id' page should use a 'Detail View' layout with charts on the left, interaction on the right.
